C

Canvas - Class in <Unnamed>
Class Canvas - a class to allow for simple graphical drawing on a canvas.
Canvas(String) - Constructor for class Canvas
Create a Canvas with default height, width and background color (300, 300, white).
Canvas(String, int, int) - Constructor for class Canvas
Create a Canvas with default background color (white).
Canvas(String, int, int, Color) - Constructor for class Canvas
Create a Canvas.
checkCollisions() - Method in class Machine
Iterates through the array list of pinballs and checks if it has collided with all objects on the machine
collide() - Method in class Ball8
Change speed when colliding with a pinball
collide() - Method in class Pinball
Method for the pinball with it collides with another pinball

Draws a String on the Canvas.

Hole - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is inherited from Machine object which will create a hole for the machine The hole colour is set to black.

The test class Simulate.

Default constructor for test class Simulate
Simulation() - Method in class Simulate
 
startMachine() - Method in class Machine
Runs the simulation checking all collisions before moving all pinballs in the array list If the game has ended, the score will be printed.
